refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: TitleAbbrev holds an abbreviated version of a Title. One common use of TitleAbbrev is for the text used in running headers or footers, when the proper title is too long to be used conveniently.

refsection.title: Processing expectations
refsection.para: Abbreviated titles are usually used only in specific contexts, such as headers and footers, and suppressed everywhere else.
